description.plain:
If you haven’t heard about Vince Staples yet, you’ve been missing out. Hailing from the LBC, Vince is one of the single best young talents that the West Coast has to offer.

Vince has been making waves since his initial breakout with the Odd Future crew and has recently even signed a deal with Def-Jam and the legendary No I.D.’s label Artium. Everything you need to know about how dope Mr. Staples can be found in his ridiculous, breakout verse on “Hive” by Earl Sweatshirt. While you’re at it, Vince has released a slew of projects over the course of the past few years, including the Shyne Coldchain series, (both 1 and 2), and the Hell Can Wait EP. It all culminates to his debut album, Summertime 06.

After the release of Summertime ‘06, Vince would go on to release his Prima Donna EP which would feature one of hip-hop’s biggest artists, A$AP Rocky.

Vince would then go on to release Big Fish Theory on June 23rd, 2017. The album featured even bigger names than the Prima Donna EP. Kendrick Lamar, Juicy J, Ty Dolla $ign, and even another project with A$AP Rocky on it.

Vince has a rather small award count, with only winning one and being nominated for another. In 2014 BET would give him the award ‘Best Impact Track’ for his song “Kingdom”. The Black Reel Awards would later nominate him for ‘Best Original or Adapted Song’ with his song “Waiting for My Moment” which was adapted from the movie Creed.

Despite him believing he should have won or been nominated for a Grammy for his album, Big Fish Theory, it was not nominated. Vince doesn’t think it should have been nominated for ‘Best Rap Album of the Year’ but rather ‘Best Electronic Album of the Year’.

Vince started off March of 2018 with a huge bang. He released a song called “Get The Fuck Off My Dick” which had a $2 million GoFundMe page attached to it with a line saying “Get off my dick or fund my lifestyle”.

songs.full_title: Versace Rap by Vince Staples

songs.lyrics:

Never asked where it was from, happy that I lent a hand
The day my grandfather died, I grew into a man

I prayed for my cousin, but them niggas still shot him

Chamber long as Tommy Chambers nigga meet your maker
As-Salamu leave em lakeside, bells can't save em
When them shells start raining, guess my mama didn't raise me right

That's the shit that happens when you put a book before your kids
The only girl I ever loved turned into a bitch
If I ever see her and I got a gun, she getting hit
That's as honest as it gets, I've done a lot of shit
I ain't proud of, but I wouldn't trade it in for Heaven
11 Mac-11's, and a Tre 57
Bet that shit will get to talking if you ever got a question
Never met a person worth trying to impress
So consider this a murder when it's 5 inside your chest
